NORTH ATLANTIC.
CAPE VERDE.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 06 THRU 27 AUG BY
   M/V SARMIENTO DE GAMBOA WITH SUBMERSIBLE
   IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 14-47.8N 025-58.6W, 14-47.4N 025-00.8W,
      13-47.2N 025-01.3W, 13-47.5N 025-58.9W.
   B. 17-10.5N 026-18.8W, 17-10.5N 025-53.5W,
      16-40.1N 025-53.5W, 16-40.4N 026-18.9W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 28 AUG 21.
